sentences: Lukid (real name Luke Blair) is an electronic music producer from London, England.
Blair is also one half of the duo Rezzett, who have released several records on London based record label The Trilogy Tapes, including a self-titled album in 2018.

Blair is also one half of the duo Rezzett, who have released several records on London based record label The Trilogy Tapes, including a self-titled album in 2018. In 2018 he also created a new pseudonym, Refreshers, releasing material on a record label of the same name.
Since 2013 Blair has hosted a monthly show on NTS Radio.
